Household.name: Household
Household.description: Items used within a house, including kitchenware, home decor, furniture, cleaning supplies, and appliances.

Books.name: Books
Books.description: Physical or digital books across various genres, including fiction, non-fiction, educational, and comics.

Clothing & Accessories.name: Clothing & Accessories
Clothing & Accessories.description: Wearable items such as apparel (shirts, pants, dresses), footwear, and accessories like bags, jewelry, and watches.

Electronics.name: Electronics
Electronics.description: Products related to electronic devices, gadgets, and accessories such as mobiles, laptops, cameras, and their components.
